short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change the font of all websites to your selected font.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A very simple extension which allows you to set custom font for every tab. Preserves the selected font and auto applies to each tab when loaded. I collect no data, I don't really even know how to. The code is open source. 
Update 1.2 - Fixed auto application of font and a few bugs with icons not drawing.
